name: Deadly Planet
description:
Deadly Planet is a simple, 2D platformer, project for the Game Design & Development  specialization. 

Changes Overview - Level Design, Menu Aesthetics and Assets. 

Specific
 Level 1 -  Defeat or avoid mechs and bipedal mechs.

Level 2 - Your enemies are tanks 

Level 3 -  Survive through a swarm of insects

For more details , please run the game and check the instructions. 

Feel free to comment or leave a recommendation. 

Assets ansimuz MattWalkkden
